Whenever Conspiracy Theorist attacks, you may pay {1} and discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

Time Walker can’t be blocked.
Whenever Time Walker deals combat damage to a player, surveil 1. Then if it isn’t an extra turn, you may exile ten cards from your graveyard. If you do, take an extra turn after this one.

Deathtouch
At the beginning of each end step, if an opponent discarded a card this turn, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have ten or more {V}, you may put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
cards.notes: Whenever you sacrifice another creature during your turn —> Whenever a player discards one or more cards — Flavor reasons, reanimate your graveyard —> reanimate any graveyard

cards.rules_text:
Menace
Whenever an artifact enters under your control for the first time each turn, you get {V} [i](a research counter)[/i].
As long as you have ten or more {V}, change the text of Equipment you control by replacing each instance of “equipped creature” with “each creature you control.”

added nonland to the bottom ability

5.16.23 changed research trigger to distinguish it from Superconductor. Now you need to attack with all your creatures.

Area 3 — Interrogation enters tapped.
When Area 3 — Interrogation enters, create a copy of Interrogate. You may cast the copy. [i](It’s a {B} sorcery with “Target opponent reveals one or more cards from their hand. You choose one of them. They discard that card. For each card in their hand not revealed this way, they lose 1 life.”)[/i]
{T}: Add {B}.

Area 53 — Armory enters tapped.
When Area 53 — Armory enters, create a copy of Tools of the Trade. You may cast the copy. [i](It’s a {3}{R} Equipment artifact with “When Tools of the Trade enters, attach it to target creature you control.” and “Equipped creature gets +3/+3.” and “Equip {3}{R}”)[/i]
{T}: Add {R}.
